name: Dreamland Arcade
description:
Steven has dreamed up arcade games for all his friends in Dreamland Arcade.

9 ARCADE GAMES
The Dreamland Arcade is open! Smash monsters with Garnet, pilot the Gem Drill with Steven, catch critters with Onion, climb the Kindergarten with Amethyst, and show off Connie’s sword skills against Holo-Pearl.

COLLECT G.E.M.S.
Cash in your tickets to earn G.E.M.S. (Game Enhancing Mini Squad). Unlock figures of your favorite Steven Universe characters, including Steven, Garnet, Pearl, Amethyst, Rose Quartz, Bismuth, Stevonnie, and more.

UPGRADE YOUR GAME
Activate your Gem powers! Use G.E.M.S. to unlock new abilities and outfits for every game.

*****
